CustomField.formula:
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Prospect_Client__c )), HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & Prospect_Client__r.Id, Prospect_Client__r.Name, "_self" ),
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Opportunity__c )), HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & Opportunity__r.Id, Opportunity__r.Name, "_self" ),
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Contact__c )), HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & Contact__r.Id, Contact__r.FirstName + ' ' + Contact__r.LastName, "_self" ),
IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Lead__c )), HYPERLINK(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) & Lead__r.Id, Lead__r.FirstName + ' ' + Lead__r.LastName, "_self" ),
'Not Linked'))))
CustomField.label: Related Record
